card.name: Gajirabute, Underworld Champion of Demon's Birth

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Once per turn, when a creature attacks a player, you may put a creature from your hand that costs the same as or less than that creature.

card.name: ♪ Rising up, Demon and Angel, will they fall

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Draw a card, then choose a number. Until the start of your next turn, ignore the abilities of your opponent's elements that cost the same as that number, and your opponent can't cast spells that cost the same as that number.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put up to 2 Demon Commands that have total cost 7 or less from your graveyard: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -12000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ This creature gets +3000 power for each of your creatures that have different costs. ■ When you put this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have less power than this one.

card.name: Quakes, Fiendish General of Demon's Birth

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, you may put any number of creatures that cost 6 or less that have different costs from among creatures you control. Put the rest into your graveyard. ■ Varavariety 5: Whenever a creature attacks a player, untap all your creatures. (If you have 5 or more elements that have different costs, this creature gets this ability.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then you may put a creature from your mana zone that costs less than any of the cards put into a mana zone this way.

card.name: Magic Circle of the Wicked Brain

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may put a non-creature card that costs 4 or less from your graveyard for no cost. ■ When you put this card from your hand into your mana zone, untap it.

card.name: Magic Circle of the Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, look at the top card of your deck. Shieldify it, put it into your hand, or put it into your mana zone. ■ When you put this card from your hand into your mana zone, untap it.

card.name: Magic Circle of the Wicked Tail

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, draw a card. Then you may put a command that costs 3 or less from your hand or mana zone. ■ When you put this card from your hand into your mana zone, untap it.

card.name: Magic Circle of the Wicked Claw

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, choose one of the following: ► Choose any number of cards from a player's graveyard. Their owner shuffles them and puts them on the bottom of their deck. ► Choose an element that costs 4 or less or a card a mana zone and put it on the bottom of its owner's deck. The owner of that card puts the top card of their deck into their mana zone. ■ When you put this card from your hand into your mana zone, untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or it attacks, you may choose one of your other creatures. That creature can't leave until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {YOBINION} (You may reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature that costs less than this spell. Put that creature. Shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.) ■ Untap all your creatures. Each of your creatures gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules

If you do, after casting it, put it on the bottom of your deck.

It can't cost less than 1.) ■ Choose a number between 1 and 13 and put the same number of cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard. Then put a creature from your graveyard. ■ Varavariety 3: If this spell is the first one you've cast this game named '♪ From Hack, Temporarily Shift, Ten and Seven', take an extra turn after this one. (If you have 3 or more elements that have different costs, this creature gets this ability.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STRIKE BACK}: Strike Back: Darkness or Fire (When a darkness or fire card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may discard that card. If you do, summon this creature for no cost.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent would put a creature in any way except by summoning, destroy that creature. Oniend: If any player has no shields, this creature gets "blocker" and "slayer".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Each turn, when a creature attacks you for the first time, you may have this creature battle that creature. ■ During your opponent's turn, if this creature leaves, you may put a creature that costs 7 or less from your mana zone.

card.name: Kiyonaga, Seeker of the Five Rings

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If they all have different costs, you may use any number of elements that cost 9 or less from among them for no cost. Put the rest into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if this creature is in your hand, and that attack is the second attack by a creature this turn, after the attack, unless you put a 'Valchuris, Dragon Armored' this turn, you may put this creature. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature attacks, if you have at least one darkness card and one fire card in your mana zone, you may show this creature from your hand to your opponent and put it on the bottom of your deck. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. Oniend: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if there is a player that has no shields, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ONIEND}: Whenever a creature attacks, if there is a player that has no shields and you have at least one darkness card and one fire card in your mana zone, you may cast this spell from your hand for no cost. ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. From among the cards put into your graveyard in this way, choose a darkness or fire non-evolution creature that costs 6 or less and put it. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your shields and add it to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger". ■ This turn, the next darkness or fire creature you summon may cost up to 4 less to summon. It can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each turn, if a creature attacked that turn, that player chooses a shield. That shield's owner puts it into their hand. (You may use the "shield trigger".) {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, neither player can put a card in their shield zone. (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy 2 of your creatures and/or tamaseeds. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, put any number of creatures that have total cost 4 or less from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures gets "slayer" until the end of the turn. (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy your opponent's creature after the battle.) ■ Add one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of your turn, add one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature gets +3000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ When you put this creature, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature gets "blocker". (You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to that creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ When you put this creature, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this tamaseed or whenever one of your Abyss attacks, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. ■ Whenever your Abyss would leave, you may choose 4 cards from your graveyard, shuffle them, and put them on the bottom of your deck instead.

card.name: Ballom Monarch, Lord of Dark Reapers

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your nature creatures. {INVASION}-Nature creature that has power 6000 or more (When one of your Nature creature that has power 6000 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put one of your other creatures into your mana zone. If you do, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put a Mystery Totem or nature Invader from the revealed cards into the battle zone. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules

During your opponent's next turn, they can't put creatures that have power 5000 or less.

Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature , choose a creature card name except 'Emotional Hardcore, Sacred Dragon'. ■ Ignore any abilities of creatures that have the chosen name. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, if you have another Oracle, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

Rules2
property.value: ■ Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of the following: ► Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then return a card from your mana zone to your hand: ► Choose a player. That player shuffles their graveyard and puts it on the bottom of their deck. ► Your opponent puts all their non-creature elements that cost 5 or less into their owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, if you have a twinpact creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Each of your twinpact creatures gets "speed attacker". ■ Once per turn, when one of your twinpact creatures attacks, you may cast the spell side of that creature in the battle zone for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger: Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may reveal this creature from your hand. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution darkness creature, put that creature and put this creature on top of it. ■ Evolution: Put on one of your darkness creatures. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever you put this creature or it attacks, you may destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures.

If it evolved on 5 or more cards, change the mana number of all cards in your opponent's mana zone to 0 until the start of your next turn. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose a civilization and destroy all your opponent's elements that have that civilization.
